episodes.title: How is the Government STILL Funding This?!?!
episodes.description:
How is this STILL going on?!?! I was naive to work for this company...

In this video, we dive deep into the dark history of Vivant Behavioral Health and their shady prequels from the same founder, John Jay Ripley, known as Youth Services International (YSI) and Sequel Youth and Family Services. From shocking allegations of child abuse and neglect to the disturbing rebranding tactics to avoid accountability, this for-profit foster care company has a lot to answer for. With over $200 million in annual revenue and countless lives affected, it's time to break the silence and demand change! #childabuseawareness  #breakingcodesilence  #juvenilejustice   #fostercare  

⚠️ Trigger Warning: This video discusses child abuse, neglect, assault, and death. Viewer discretion is advised. ⚠️

Resources:

- Childhelp National Child Abuse Hotline: 1-800-422-4453
- Breaking Code of Silence: www.breakingcodesilence.org
- Find your elected officials: www.usa.gov/elected-officials
- APM Reports: www.apmreports.org
- Psych Crime: www.psychcrime.org
- Vice News (This Company Profits Off the Most Vulnerable Children in the US) www.youtube.com/watch?v=GHtxLMoNQgc
- 504 Info: www.weareteachers.com/what-is-a-504-plan
- ADA Info: adacentral.com/resources

👉 Don't forget to like, comment, and subscribe for more eye-opening content. Together, we can make a difference!

More Disclaimers:

Personal Opinion Disclaimer: The views expressed regarding Sequel Care Youth and Family Services, SYI, and Vivant Behavioral Health, John Jay Ripley, as well as any other individual talked about in this video, are my own opinions and interpretations.

Public Disclaimer: The information presented in this video is based on publicly available online sources.

Citations: 
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1BOHhA0bCnfN755YgWCLKd9tu7b1R5HpbWMnb9HdvZts/

episodes.title: The Dark Side of Christian Forgiveness
episodes.description:
Hey everyone! 
In this video, I'm discussing my experience with how Christian forgiveness can be misused and manipulated. We'll explore how it can affect self-esteem and delve into cases like Brittany Dawn and Josh Duggar (yikes!). 
We'll also explore if forgiveness can have positive aspects, or is it just BS? Let me know your thoughts in the comments below!  #forgiveness manipulation #exfundie #exchristian #abuse #accountability #findingself after religion 

Christian Forgiveness is BS!?!
0:00 Intro
0:36 The Problem with Forgiveness: The Hustle
0:56 Christian Forgiveness is Rooted in God's forgiveness of humanity's sins
2:36 Emphasizes grace and mercy
3:36 Can be seen as a one-time act
5:12 Sometimes can be tied to reconciliation
6:07 Who Needs Forgiveness the Most???
6:45 Two Case Studies: Redemption Hungry People (All In my Opinion)
6:50 Brittany Dawn: Scam Queen Gets Saved (TW: ED)
12:06 Josh Duggar: Family Values... Except for His (TW: SA and CP)
17:51 Why Christians Let Them In? The Enablers
18:19 #1 The All-Forgiving Facade
19:40 #2 The Redemption Industry
20:25 My Christian Forgiveness Theory
22:05 Outro

Personal Opinion Disclaimer: The views expressed regarding Christianity, as well as Brittany Dawn and Josh Duggar specifically, are my own opinions and interpretations.

Content Warning Disclaimer: This video discusses sensitive topics related to religion and forgiveness. This video discusses sensitive topics such as SA, CP, ED, and abuse. Viewer discretion is advised.

Domestic Violence hotline: https://www.thehotline.org/
The Trevor Project Text: 678-678
SAMHSA’s National Helpline: 1-800-662-HELP (4357)

Citations: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1oqher8suIFVlzeY4yOGuCJpst_pY0OK93QJRkKrTKZ8/edit?usp=sharing

episodes.title: The 3 REAL Reasons God Lets Bad Things Happen
episodes.description:
Why is there suffering in the world? What is the source of evil? Why do bad things happen to good people? Why is there so much injustice? How could this tragedy have happened? Why is there so much violence in the world? What factors contribute to negative events in the world? How can we explain misfortune?

Same lol... here are the 3 REAL Reasons god lets bad things happen. Please comment any that I missed below. 

00:00 Intro
00:40 Reason 1: Things Just Happen (not the most satisfying answer) 
01:45 Reason 2: God is not completely in control (Almighty God v Free Will)
03:20 Reason 3: God is EVIL (An Unknowable Plan... or No Plan at All)
04:57 Busting 7 Common Christian Myths
5:01 Myth #1: God Works in Mysterious Ways
5:34 Myth #2: Free Will and the Fall: (Sin in the World)
6:16 Myth #3: Refining Faith
6:44 Myth #4: Building Character
07:17 Myth #5: God Uses Suffering for Good
07:50 Racism against Haiti
09:39 Myth #6: Heaven's Reward
10:36 Problem of Evil
10:50 Scale of Suffering
11:00 Palestinian Genocide
11:25 Meaning and Hope
11:40 Outro
